snippet.title: Anomaly Horror Game: HANGAR 8 Release Date Trailer ( itch.io )
snippet.description:
A psychological horror game set within the unsettling confines of a derelict space station. Brave the looping corridors, discover all 42 anomalies, collect key items, and escape the nightmare!

Blending anomaly spotting mechanics from games such as "The Exit 8" and "I'm on Observation Duty", with the liminal-space psychological horror of "The Backrooms", HANGAR 8 challenges both your memory and your sanity.

Looking for a new anomaly hunting game?
HANGAR 8 is releasing on itch.io on Friday the 13th of September 2024!
https://twintaildigital.itch.io/hangar8

#horrorgaming #games #trailer #hangar8 #scarygaming #spooky #anomaly #gametrailers #itchio #pcgaming
